Body: How do you share devices with someone else on ARTIK Cloud. I am trying to do this through using the APIs. Thanks.

Take a look at our device sharing documentation. https://developer.artik.cloud/documentation/advanced-features/device-sharing.html This also can be done using your my.artik.cloud account. You will need to: Create a device share: POST /devices//shares In which you share the device with a someone. - first you must obtain the device id and provide an email of the person you want to share the device with.

More details in our API reference documentation: https://developer.artik.cloud/documentation/api-reference/rest-api.html#create-a-device-share.

"
